definition: to take troubles to heart (idiom); brooding
loyal and devoted (idiom); faithful and true

sentences.english: The nature of this income is what rankles.
sentences.chinese: 這些收入的性質正是讓人耿耿於懷的地方。

sentences.english: But Daniel was blameless , for he was loyal to both God and the King.
sentences.chinese: 可但以理對王對上帝都忠心耿耿，無可挑剔。

sentences.english: Sharp intention cures, utterly loyal, is a talented individual on the political.
sentences.chinese: 銳意圖治，忠心耿耿，政治上是一位幹才。

sentences.english: He often treated his friends badly; butt t hey remained loyal tot he last.
sentences.chinese: 他經常不善待朋友，但朋友們卻始終對他忠心耿耿。

sentences.english: Victory in the heart of LiuJianMin cast money for beautiful things from the book.
sentences.chinese: 勝利心中還對劉建民給美麗投錢出書的事耿耿於懷。

sentences.english: She hated Simpson, even though she handed her the crown.
sentences.chinese: 儘管辛普森讓她頭頂皇冠，她依然對前者耿耿於懷。

sentences.english: Don't get too detailed on this or go overboard with your preparations.
sentences.chinese: 清單不宜過細，對準備工作也別過於耿耿於懷了。

sentences.english: That anything to make you grudge or concerned isn't what I wonna see.
sentences.chinese: 這事讓你耿耿於懷，或關心的並非是我想看到的。

sentences.english: Both children seem very loyal to their adoptive mother.
sentences.chinese: 兩個孩子似乎都對他們的養母忠心耿耿。

sentences.english: Monroe complains too about her early adolescent experiences of sexual harassment.
sentences.chinese: 夢露對自己少女時期經歷的性騷擾耿耿於懷。

sentences.english: Bostonians' reserved demeanor had bothered him for years.
sentences.chinese: 多年來他一直對波士頓人靦腆的性格耿耿於懷。

sentences.english: The only thing that rankles me is what she says about Ireland .
sentences.chinese: 唯一使我耿耿於懷的就是她那些關於愛爾蘭的言論。

sentences.english: He has 20 years of loyal service to Barclays Bank behind him.
sentences.chinese: 他已經忠心耿耿地爲巴克萊銀行效力了20年。

sentences.english: The insult still rankled in his mind.
sentences.chinese: 他對那次受辱仍耿耿於懷。

sentences.english: But he couldn't forget his brush with fame and fortune.
sentences.chinese: 但他仍對與榮譽和財富擦肩而過的往事耿耿於懷。

sentences.english: Some, resenting being sent, failed to fulfil their potential.
sentences.chinese: 有些人對被派到基層耿耿於懷，沒能發揮他們的潛力。

definition: variant of 辜負|辜负[gu1 fu4]
from dawn to dusk/all the time
